input.job_description:
EXPERIENCE  
Business Development Manager  @FINLOYD  (2012  > Present)  
I. Develop ing growth strategies by analyzing market strategies.  
II. Making N egotiating strategies by integration of new venture 
with company strategies.  
III. To Secure & Protect the company’s confidential information.  
IV. Managing & Retaining Relationship with existing Clien ts. 
V. Developing Sales goals for team & ensure they met.  
VI. Making q uotes & Proposals  
 
 
 Sales Team Mentor  @ALPHA Group (2010 -2012 ) 
 I. To evaluate new opportunities by quantifies  business 
intelligence.  
II. Promotes a professional company image by excellent services, 
sales & Communication skills.  
III. Possess a strong knowledge of product  & our competitors in the 
industry.  
IV. Ability to solve the tough problems with creative talents.  
 
 Sales Executive @ALPHA Group (2009-2010 ) 
 I. Planning & Organizing d aily work schedule on potential clients  
II. Making Business Presentations according to the industry.  
III. Organizational skills are important in order to pri oritize tasks & 
meet deadlines.  
IV. To Expand the clients, teamwork skills are very much efficient.  
EDUCATION  
Sikkim Manipal University  (2009 -2013) 
BBA- Bachelor in Business Administrations.  
WESTECH COLLEGE, UK  (2006-2007)  
Diploma in Business Administrations, DBA  ABOUT ME  
1. I am always into maintaining fruitful 
relationships with existing clients.  
2. Ability to handle pressure & meet 
deadlines.  
3. In depth knowledge of security 
industry fields.  
4. Excellent time management & 
organizations.  
5. Strong Proficiency in Microsoft 
word, Excel, Power Point & E -media 
CS, ZOHO, Card Presso.  
6. Ability to communicate informations 
with the technical client in a concise 
manner.  
7. Technical skills of providing the 
clients with the better & convincin g 
solutions.  
8. Excellent organizational skills with 
emphasis on priorities & goal 
setting.  
9. Experiences working to & exceeding 
targets.  
10. Able to provide quality leadership to 
a large team of sales people.  Zain Younas  
Senior Business development/ Business 
development Specialist/ Sales Team Leader/ Sr. 
Security Consultant/ Sales Specialist.  
Mob# +966544352196  ---- zainyounas@gmail.com  
EXPER TISE 
Sales  Goals  
Market Knowledge  
Territory M anagement  
Communication  Skills  
Management Skills  
Negotiation Skills
input.additional_info: Innovate Dynamics Ltd. prioritizes applicants from top-tier universities such as [University X] and [University Y]. Relocation assistance is available for candidates willing to move to Hyderabad. Technical skills are assessed through standardized tests and a series of interviews. Our company encourages diversity and inclusivity in the hiring process.
minimum_requirements: Ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously
